body.description: 10" wide, tear resistant sponge with raised cleaning circles to scour any sticky spots stuck on hard surfaces. Great for removing scuff marks and sticky substances from hallways, rooms, porches, walkways, patios and many other areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cleaning with these
reviews.reviewText: I have a lot of animals who constantly track in mud, dirt etc., all over my hard floors. I gave up on wall to wall carpet a long time ago. These help scrub up the dirt they bring in and when I rinse I feel like my floors are really clean. I've had the same mop frame for four years now and just keep ordering these to use with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy To Install And Much Less Waste Than A New Mop
reviews.reviewText: The sponge on the mop finally gave out - I don't know how many years of service - probably 10 or more. Anyhoo, these replacements heads arrived and installation was a breeze. I feel much better about having to throw away only a worn out mop-head than the whole darn mop! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a refill...but different than the original
reviews.reviewText: The original had stripes of scrubby green abrasive stuff on the sponge. These are solid green abrasive scrubby. Fit OK. a good value compared to buying elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Cleaning Companion!
reviews.reviewText: As a dedicated home cleaner who values a spotless living space, the Libman 2011 Nitty Gritty Roller Mop Refill has become my ultimate cleaning companion for maintaining sparkling floors.The first thing that stands out is the high-quality construction of this mop refill. The nitty-gritty roller effectively traps dirt, dust, and grime, ensuring a thorough and efficient cleaning process.The design of the Libman Nitty Gritty Roller Mop Refill is a standout feature. It easily attaches to my mop handle, making replacement quick and hassle-free.One significant advantage of this refill is its versatility. It is suitable for use on various floor surfaces, including tiles, wood, laminate, and linoleum, making it an all-in-one solution for my cleaning needs.The durable and long-lasting material of the Libman Nitty Gritty Roller Mop Refill ensures that it can withstand frequent use, providing reliable cleaning performance for an extended period.In conclusion, the Libman 2011 Nitty Gritty Roller Mop Refill is more than just a mop refill; it's an essential tool for achieving spotless floors in my home. With its effective dirt trapping, easy attachment, versatile use, and durable material, this mop refill has become an indispensable part of my cleaning routine. For home cleaners seeking efficiency and effectiveness, the Libman Nitty Gritty Roller Mop Refill is a top-notch choice. Keep your floors sparkling with confidence, thanks to the Libman 2011 Nitty Gritty Roller Mop Refill!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Original Manufacturer Mop Head Replacement
reviews.reviewText: Original Manufacturer Mop Head Replacement. The price was good. I was offered an overnight option. I had my doubts but it came overnight as promised. delivered by an Amazon Van. Two thumbs up! I'd give them six stars on this if there was one more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only one that works 100%
reviews.reviewText: It is the best style of mop!! Much better than those you need major muscular arms to ring out RIGHT!! Definitely best price. I feel blessed that I have never ripped off by Amazon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this refill for my mop and it works great and is durable. It is better than the original sponge that came with the mop. Will order again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Falls apart pretty easily but it’s still less expensive than other mopheads.
reviews.reviewText: This is a good replacement for the more expensive my pads that fit the Libman mops, however it doesn’t last all that long. At the price, which is still less than others, it should last longer. The sponge material disintegrates quickly.
Pour laver des murs et planchers formidable très durable satisfait du produit.
